original_text: This he said, not that he cared for the poor; but because he was a thief, and had the bag, and bare what was put therein.
korean_text: 이렇게 말함은 가난한 자들을 생각함이 아니요 그는 도둑이라 돈궤를 맡고 거기 넣는 것을 훔쳐 감이러라

sentences.original_text: not that he cared for the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가난한 사람들을 돌보았기 때문이 아니었다

sentences.original_text: but because he was a thief
and bare what was put therein
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 안에 넣어진 것을 훔쳤다
